name: A Toy Minion Jump Story - My Incredible Magic Monster Adventure FREE
name_original: A Toy Minion Jump Story - My Incredible Magic Monster Adventure FREE
description:
Join Marvin the Magic Minion on his magical bouncing adventure! Tap, jump, and leap through 25 levels of action filled with candy, fruit and sweets. Fun for the kids and the entire family!

FEATURES

- 25 levels of fun through 5 magical lands
- Beautiful hand painted scenery
- Collect fruit and candy power-ups to conquer every level!
- Gain 10 different achievements on your adventure

HOW TO PLAY: Tap to jump off of one platform to the next. Tap a second time to jump again while in the air. The longer you fall the higher you jump. Collect as many treasures and power-ups as possible to maximize your score on your adventure!

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback? We would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com.
